title: Tomica Hyper Rescue Drive Head: Kidou Kyuukyuu Keisatsu
overview: To respond to disasters beyond human comprehension and the increasing complexity of crime and mishaps, the mobile emergency police Hyper Rescue (an organization newly formed by the government primarily for life-saving) developed 'Drive Heads' that are specialized with police, fire-fighting, and rescue capabilities. The grade schooler G≈ç Kurumada and other children found to be suitable become drivers and join forces with the mobile emergency police and other adults.
